categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems space stations

nodes.text: Starlag XIX was a space station attached to an asteroid. It served as a private intergalactic prison. At the time of the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems used to move some of its prisoners there.

During the Imperial Era, its owner Tolteck organized death matches between the inmates. In 2 BBY,[source?] Ketsu Onyo was Tolteck's prisoner for a time, until Hera Syndulla, Garazeb Orrelios, and Rex came to her rescue.
